name: AcuteMyocardialInfarctionI10
title: Acute Myocardial Infarction I10
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains diagnoses used to identify with an active diagnosis of acute myocardio infarction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an active diagnosis of AMI. The QDM Category linked to this value set: Condition / Diagnosis / Problem),(Inclusion Criteria: All diagnosis codes describing an active AMI utilizing ICD-10 codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: The value set specifically excludes for Acute Atrial Infarction; also exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
